body_html:
Hi,
I encountered the same problem (using TF version 1.10). After upgrading to nightly, the error message changes, but the issue is still there:
File "/home/maks/miniconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/keras/engine/training_utils.py", line 332, in standardize_input_data ' but got array with shape ' + str(data_shape)) ValueError: Error when checking input: expected Flat_Input to have shape (250882,) but got array with shape (1,)
Any solutions?
Cheers,
Maks

body:
Hi,
I encountered the same problem (using TF version 1.10). After upgrading to nightly, the error message changes, but the issue is still there:
`File "/home/maks/miniconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/keras/engine/training_utils.py", line 332, in standardize_input_data
    ' but got array with shape ' + str(data_shape))
ValueError: Error when checking input: expected Flat_Input to have shape (250882,) but got array with shape (1,)`
Any solutions?
Cheers,
Maks
